mapper.select: SELECT notice_id AS id, notice_title AS title, notice_fixed_yn AS fixedYn, notice_enrollment_date AS enrollmentDateTime FROM NOTICE WHERE notice_use_yn = 1

SELECT notice_id AS id, notice_writer AS writer, notice_title AS title, notice_content AS content, notice_fixed_yn AS fixedYn, notice_enrollment_date AS enrollmentDateTime FROM NOTICE WHERE notice_use_yn = 1 AND notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( notice_writer, notice_title, notice_content, notice_fixed_yn, notice_use_yn, notice_enrollment_date ) VALUES ( #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, 1, 1, #{enrollmentDateTime} )
